properties.name: mockdata
properties.description: Populates the database with demo data for development purposes.

properties.name: jwt.validity
properties.description: The time in seconds for which a generated JWT is valid.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: The secret used for signing JWTs.

properties.name: results-storage-path
properties.description: The path to the local storage location of the results.

properties.name: service-user.name
properties.description: Name of the user used for internal communication between services.

properties.name: service-user.password
properties.description: Password of the user used for internal communication between services.

properties.name: service-user.secret
properties.description: The secret used for validating that the requesting side is actually an internal service.
